I love a lot of things about this time of the year: I’m a big holiday movie person, for one, and it doesn’t get more nostalgic than A Charlie Brown Thanksgiving and A Charlie Brown Christmas. There’s something about the Peanuts gang that never gets old — which is probably why Snoopy has been having a renaissance on social media over the past year. Both Peanuts flicks are on my required viewing list between now and the end of the year.

Another trademark of the season that I can’t get enough of? Cozy drinks. I’ve been counting down the days until it’s acceptable to whip out my hot chocolate mix. (We discovered the best one you can buy at the store, FYI.) Once the temperature dips, my ideal night in combines both of my favorite things: getting a classic holiday movie going and sipping a warm beverage. The only thing that could make it more perfect is this Snoopy- and Christmas-themed mug that I just found on Amazon, which is going straight into my cart.

What is DaySpring’s Peanuts “Christmastime is Here” Ceramic Mug?

This adorable gem features all of the most prominent members of the Peanuts crew, with each of them on ice skates: Sally trails after Woodstock, Franklin, and Charlie Brown. Next to them, Snoopy is up to his trademark shenanigans, trying to steal Linus’ blanket from him while he holds on. The design winds its way around the mug, so that no matter which way you hold it, it’ll look cute. The overall vibe is similar to the comics in its charming simplicity, with the sole pops of color being a gorgeous turquoise — the same hue as Linus’ blanket — and the yellow feathers of Woodstock. 

The design is finished off with text along the top that reads “Christmastime is here” in vintage-looking lettering, which just makes it all the more perfect for the season. Once you finish up your drink, you’ll find another graphic of Woodstock at the bottom of the mug, with the words “Happiness and cheer” right above him. Further, most mugs typically hold no more than 12 ounces, but this one has a 14-ounce capacity. What’s more, you don’t have to be afraid of tossing it in the microwave or dishwasher because it’s built to hold up.

All of these factors make it an excellent gift for yourself or someone else — in fact, it comes in a giftable box, and there’s even a red version that matches, reading “Happiness and cheer” on the outside instead of the inside. Then, you can grab one for you and one for your bestie or loved one! What better way to get into the holiday spirit, right?

Buy: DaySpring Peanuts “Christmastime is Here” Ceramic Mug, $14.99
